cab.content: his document Is the property of His Britannic Majesty1a Government).Note "by Hr. long, on Memorandum "by Mr. Puke ,(G.T. 2137).I desire to support the suggestion made by the Chief Secretary for Ireland as to expenditure.The existing restrictions work very badly, do not tend to eoonomy. and very greatly hamper the Irish Government in their administration.I believe the change advocated by Mr. Duke would have most beneficial and far-reaching results.E C R E g.WARCABINET.G.T.2177THE IRISH SITUATIOIJ(Sd) Walter H. Long.29th September 1917.
